movie_content.title: Inception
movie_content.description: A skilled thief, who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology, is given a chance to erase his criminal past if he can implant an idea into a target's subconscious.
movie_content.castlist: Leonardo DiCaprio – Dom Cobb, Joseph Gordon-Levitt – Arthur, Ellen Page – Ariadne, Tom Hardy – Eames, Cillian Murphy – Robert Fischer

movie_content.title: Avengers: End Game
movie_content.description: After the devastating events of Infinity War, the remaining Avengers assemble once more to reverse Thanos’ actions and restore balance to the universe in one final stand.
movie_content.castlist: Robert Downey Jr. – Tony Stark / Iron Man, Chris Evans – Steve Rogers / Captain America, Mark Ruffalo – Bruce Banner / Hulk, Chris Hemsworth – Thor, Scarlett Johansson – Natasha Romanoff / Black Widow

movie_content.title: The Dark Knight
movie_content.description: When the menace known as the Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc on Gotham, forcing Batman closer to crossing the line between hero and vigilante.
movie_content.castlist: Christian Bale – Bruce Wayne / Batman, Heath Ledger – Joker, Aaron Eckhart – Harvey Dent, Gary Oldman – James Gordon, Michael Caine – Alfred Pennyworth

movie_content.title: Interstellar
movie_content.description: A team of explorers travels through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity’s survival as Earth becomes uninhabitable.
movie_content.castlist: Matthew McConaughey – Cooper, Anne Hathaway – Amelia Brand, Jessica Chastain – Murphy, Michael Caine – Professor Brand, Matt Damon – Mann
